## Description {#details}

X86&#95;64 code that&#39;s common to all ABIs.

X86&#95;64 supports lazy JITing.

Definition at line 130 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-h">OrcABISupport.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### writeIndirectStubsBlock() {#a8d736b593133dd9a3f07b7bb9c390533}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::orc::OrcX86&#95;64&#95;Base::writeIndirectStubsBlock (char &#42; StubsBlockWorkingMem, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> StubsBlockTargetAddress, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> PointersBlockTargetAddress, unsigned NumStubs)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Write NumStubs indirect stubs to working memory at StubsBlockWorkingMem.

Stubs will be written as if linked at StubsBlockTargetAddress, with the Nth stub using the Nth pointer in memory starting at PointersBlockTargetAddress.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-h/#l00149">149</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-h">OrcABISupport.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-cpp/#l00217">217</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-cpp">OrcABISupport.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### writeTrampolines() {#acba3a372beb547bb5ac552e05b10c687}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::orc::OrcX86&#95;64&#95;Base::writeTrampolines (char &#42; TrampolineBlockWorkingMem, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> TrampolineBlockTargetAddress, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> ResolverAddr, unsigned NumTrampolines)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Write the requested number of trampolines into the given memory, which must be big enough to hold 1 pointer, plus NumTrampolines trampolines.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-h/#l00140">140</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-h">OrcABISupport.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-cpp/#l00199">199</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/orcabisupport-cpp">OrcABISupport.cpp</a>.
